definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: I will praise God's name in song and glorify him with thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 我要以詩歌讚美神的名，以感謝稱他爲大。

sentences.english: Wen Yiduo ever sang highly of Liu's creation.
sentences.chinese: 聞一多曾高度評價過他的詩歌創作。

sentences.english: Firstly, poetry is the product of combining poetry and music from the origin.
sentences.chinese: 第一，詩歌從本源上講是詩樂結合的產物。

sentences.english: Poems by Wordsworth , Gorge Gordon Byron and John Keats have long been favorites.
sentences.chinese: 華茲華斯，拜倫，濟慈的詩歌一直爲人們所鍾愛。

sentences.english: Summery:Poetry is a kind of art of language, and also implies profound scientific spirits.
sentences.chinese: 詩歌是語言的藝術，其本身又蘊涵着深厚的科學精神。

sentences.english: My song has put off her adornments . She has no pride of dress and decoration.
sentences.chinese: 我的詩歌卸掉妝飾，她沒有衣飾的驕傲。

sentences.english: He is interested in the translation and study on chinese modern poems.
sentences.chinese: 他的最大志趣是中國現代詩歌的翻譯與研究。

sentences.english: Religious cultures produce poetry and theater, not novels.
sentences.chinese: 宗教文化滋生出詩歌和戲劇，而非小說。

sentences.english: Visual beauty of poetry is very important in modern poetry.
sentences.chinese: 詩的視覺美在現代詩歌中十分重要。

sentences.english: Illustrated poetry is the artistic integration of Chinese poetry and painting .
sentences.chinese: 題畫詩，是中國詩歌與中國繪畫相互融合的藝術結晶。

sentences.english: The second chapter is "Late-Tang-Dynasty Poetic Form and Constitution of its Poetry Image".
sentences.chinese: 第二章“晚唐體與晚唐體詩歌意象的構成”。

sentences.english: It's a poem deeply invested, in fact, in the entire Western tradition of poetry in general.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這是一首植根於，西方詩歌傳統的詩。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is "Artistic Conception of Image Combination of Poetry in Late-Tang-Dynasty Poetic Form".
sentences.chinese: 第四章“晚唐體詩歌意象組合的審美境界”。

sentences.english: Du fu, ancient Chinese poetry history one of the greatest poets.
sentences.chinese: 杜甫，中國古代詩歌史上最巨大的詩人之一。

sentences.english: Culture is in central position to Tang Poetry translation.
sentences.chinese: 質言之，文化是考察詩歌意蘊和英譯唐詩的核心。

sentences.english: He would immortalize her in a poem.
sentences.chinese: 他會在詩歌裏讓她不朽。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
